pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Importance Measures for Multivariate Random Forests // Calculates post-hoc variable importance measures for multivariate random forests. These are given by split improvement for splits defined by feature j as measured using user-defined (i.e. training or test) examples. Importance measures can also be calculated on a per-outcome variable basis using the change in predictions for each split. Both measures can be optionally thresholded to include only splits that produce statistically significant changes as measured by an F-test.
